usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to build and deploy conversational AI applications, allowing developers to create interactive experiences that mimic human-like conversations. With Chainlit, developers can quickly develop and test their own conversational AI projects using tools and services such as OpenAI and LangChain.
